channel.title: denton on Barefoot Rob

item.title: roadtrip to Denton to surprise my brother
item.description: Wednesday 5 March 1997 (transcribed out of my diary) Sunday night Wende and I drove to Denton to harass Fred in class Monday. We played 2 versions of the Alphabet Game (*) and had wonderful conversation on the way up there. I don’t remember what we talked about, but it was great. Once we got there, I essentially fell asleep immediately after we got back from shopping for milk, OJ & pizza.
